page.title: 07A DAY FISHING
page.content: In the morning I got up and looked out of the window to see what sort of a day it was. Not too hot and not too cold - so I set up my fishing rod and went out to dig up some worms which I put in the bait box. After breakfast I set off down to the river. I found a good place to cast off and then waited. If you are fishing you have to be very quiet and patient. After about twenty minutes I got a bite. Altogether I caught seven fish which I put back into the river. Then I packed everything up and went home for something to eat.
